amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 423 which prohibits the use of funds to develop any new interpretation of specified regulations pertaining to surface mining.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 423, which prohibits the use of funds to develop any new interpretation of specified regulations pertaining to surface mining.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 239 (Roll no. 397).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
